About me

Hello! My name is Baback Tavakol. I am a front-end developer from Dallas, Texas. At Zero to Mastery Academy, I learned languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js. Additionally, I have learned to use GitHub, Mailchimp, and Netlify in order to store and deploy applications. You can find some of my projects below.

I have a passion for learning new things, collaborating with and helping others, and building things that can make a difference. When I am not at the computer, I enjoy spending time with my wife, traveling, playing sports, and volunteering my time to help others.

View Resume

My Projects

Cantina LaDroido

Do you need someone to help you translate into over six-million languages? Are you tired of not knowing what to do when your hyper-drive just will not work? Come see us at the Cantina! Here, you will find Droids from across the galaxy that provide just what you need. They can help you in accomplishing all sorts of tasks. Anything from helping you get your space ship going again, to helping you communicate with your customers from any given system!

See Live Source Code

Code Inn

Are you taking on the exciting challenge of a new startup company? Do you need help developing a website for your new business? Come visit us at Code Inn! We have plenty of cozy vancancies available for your new website. Our developers will not only develop and deploy your new website, they will also help keep things updated and running smoothly, creating a nice user experience for you and your customers. Can't wait to help you "inn" your business adventures!

See Live Source Code

Surf-Faces

Here at Surf-Faces, you will be able to create a username, login, and upload any photo of a person! After you upload your photo, our technology will detect any persons face. It will get you "surfing" through "faces" over and over again! This site is still a work in progress, but we here at Surf-Faces are excited to share this user experience with you very soon.

Coming Soon To a Browser Near You!
